title: Bug 49299 Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 Misleading Documentation on Custom Cookie Name and URL Rewriting
description: Bug 49299 Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrectly states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
OB: The observed behavior is not explicitly provided in the bug report.
EB: I expect the documentation to accurately reflect the behavior. Based on the context, it seems the expected behavior is for the Reload link to be http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
SR:
1. Navigate to the URL http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp
2. Observe the behavior of the Reload link
3. Verify that the session cookie is correctly appended to the URL as MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
